definition: to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
variant of 念[nian4], to read aloud

sentences.english: The priest's two male parrots are holding rosary beads and praying in their cage.
sentences.chinese: 牧师的两只公鹦鹉正夹着念珠在笼子里作玫瑰经祷告。

sentences.english: Her hands lay open in her lap and, loosely between them, a rosary .
sentences.chinese: 她的双手摊开放在膝上，一串念珠松松地拿在手间。

sentences.english: Inhibition of allicin against Candida albicans in vitro was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 探讨大蒜素对白色念珠菌生长的抑制作用。

sentences.english: Zhou Zhuren prompted an oral candidiasis, also known as thrush.
sentences.chinese: 周主任提示这是一种口腔念珠菌感染，也称鹅口疮。

sentences.english: In two of his four hands he holds a water pot and a rosary .
sentences.chinese: 在他的两个四手，他拥有一个水锅和念珠。

sentences.english: Religious jewellery such as rosary beads and bracelet makes for an interesting gift.
sentences.chinese: 念珠，手镯等宗教首饰也是有趣的礼物。

sentences.english: To discuss the chest X-ray representations of geriatric lung candidiasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨老年人肺念珠菌病胸部X线表现。

sentences.english: There also were openings of ducts in the nodes of elytral grooves that often contained accumulations of some substance.
sentences.chinese: 在鞘翅纵沟纹的念珠状结中有管状开口。

sentences.english: Most mycotic infections were candidiasis of lung.
sentences.chinese: 真菌感染主要为肺部念珠菌感染。

sentences.english: Methods: The data of 52 COPD cases iatrogenic pneumonia were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 方法对52例医院获得性念珠菌肺炎病人进行分析。

sentences.english: The results of this study demonstrate that sodium pyrithione has an effect of inhibiting Candida albicans in vivo and in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 本研究证明吡硫霉净对白念珠菌确有抑菌作用。

sentences.english: From prayer beads, key rings, necklaces , hand chains to pendants, providing with numerous varieties.
sentences.chinese: 从念珠到钥匙扣，项链，手链，挂件，种类很多。

sentences.english: As he turns it over, he discovers that one end is loose.
sentences.chinese: 他将念珠翻过来看时，发现其中一端松动了。

sentences.english: The effects of aqueous decoction of peony radices cortex(ADPRC) on C.
sentences.chinese: 研究牡丹皮水煎剂对体外白念珠菌生物膜的影响。

sentences.english: The cells are arranged in Beadlike chains grouped together in a gelatinous mass.
sentences.chinese: 细胞排列呈念珠状，群集于胶团中。

definition: the staff of a Buddhist monk
the Eternal Wheel of life in Buddhism
the six-syllable Sanskrit mantra of Avalokiteshvara bodhisattva (i.e. om mani padme hum)
kasaya, a patchwork outer vestment worn by a Buddhist monk
Buddhist monk's knife (not used for killing)
